messages.title: Please make sure that you can have your say.
messages.content: This is a simple request that you act now to make sure that you can vote. We donâ€™t know when the General Election will be. But we do know that the constituency in which you live will be decided by only a handful of votes.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The result in your constituency (Liverpool Wavertree) could be very close.

politicalExperience.role: Agent for Liberal MP for Liverpool Mossley Hill
politicalExperience.achievements: I was able to estimate his majority to within 50 votes.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Chris Rennard mentions his prior role as agent for people like David Alton and Mike Storey, emphasizing the importance of the vote. Expresses uncertainty about election date and emphasizes the potentially close vote in the leaflet recipient's constituency.
